text: "Formation" is a song by American singer and songwriter Beyoncé from her sixth studio album Lemonade (2016). Beyoncé wrote and produced the song with Mike Will Made It, with Swae Lee and Pluss as co-writers. The track was released on February 6, 2016. It is a trap and bounce song to positive reviews from critics. ==References== Category:Beyoncé songs
title: Formation (song)
